Classes org.jdtaus.core.io.util.MemoryFileOperations and org.jdtaus.core.io.util.RandomAccessFileOperations>/code> did not update the file pointer value when using one of the methods read(OutputStream) or write(InputStream).
Class org.jdtaus.core.io.util.MemoryFileOperations did not update the file pointer value correctly when truncating a file.

Added classes
  • org.jdtaus.core.text.util.MessageLogger
Updated classes
  • org.jdtaus.core.io.util.CoalescingFileOperations:
    Changed the modifier of method getBlockSize() from private to public. Added method getFileOperations(). Added method close() introduced in the 1.3 API FileOperations interface.
  • org.jdtaus.core.io.util.MemoryFileOperations:
    Added method close() introduced in the 1.3 API FileOperations interface.
  • org.jdtaus.core.io.util.RandomAccessFileOperations:
    Added method close() introduced in the 1.3 API FileOperations interface.
  • org.jdtaus.core.io.util.RandomAccessFileOperations:
    Changed the modifier of method getCacheSize() from private to public. Added method getFileOperations(). Added method close() introduced in the 1.3 API FileOperations interface.
  • org.jdtaus.core.monitor.util.SwingProgressMonitor:
    Changed the modifier of methods getMillisToPopup() and getMillisToDecideToPopup() from private to public.
  • org.jdtaus.core.text.util.SwingMessagePane:
    Added method getMaximumMessages(). Added support for MessageEvents of type ERROR. Added a constructor taking the value of property maximumMessages for programmatic configuration.
